import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; import './style.css'; export default function CreditLineRequestReceived({ showDetailsSent, data, setShowClosingModal, rejectFunc, approveFunc, setShowDetailsReceived }) { const overlayClick = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (event.target === event.currentTarget) { setShowDetailsReceived(false); } }; return ( {showDetailsSent ? (
overlayClick(e)}>
{/* icon */}

{data.addr}

Collateral Asset
Liquidation Threshold
Autoliquidate
rejectFunc()}> Reject
approveFunc()}> Approve

) : null} ); }
